metadata.metaDescription:
In our May issue:

👉 Check out our cover story and discover how Anthony Leo, owner and CEO of Dragon's Eye Consulting, has been using his Community Care initiative to give back to local charities!

👉 Learn more about abstract artist Bodo and the large-scale NFT project he’ll be launching soon! 

👉 Discover how you can have creative, nature-based outdoor gatherings with Mobile Mixer. 

We’ve got lots of great content to share with you! Check out our May issue now!
